Package actions.targeters.targets

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Targetable
    Abstract interface providing the most basic common methods of all Targets
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicTarget
    This target primarily identifies an individual Pawn, be it a player controlled pawn, a terminator, a turret or a domination point.
    DirectionTarget  
    DominationPointTarget
    This target represents DominationPoint in the sandbox, it is a subclass of BasicTarget, similarly to DominationPoint being a subclass of Pawn The only significant difference is that Domination Points can't reach any tile other than their own and don't see any tile
    GroupTarget
    This class represents a group of pawns, unlike other selectors the Group target doesn't have its own selectors or filters, instead it is built by taking a Set of BasicTarget and feeding it into the class constructor
    RoomTarget
    This target represents a Room in the sandbox as well as targeting all players in a room
    TileTarget
    This class represents a Tile in the sandbox as well as a tile being targeted
